changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE USER ( ID NUMBER(19,0) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, USERID VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, FIRSTNAME VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL, LASTNAME VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL, GENDER VARCHAR2(5) NOT NULL, USERNAME VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL, PASSWORD VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL, EMAIL VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL, CREATEDATE DATE DEFAULT SYSDATE, UPDATEDATE DATE DEFAULT SYSDATE, STREET VARCHAR2(255) NOT NULL, CITY VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL, ZIPCODE VARCHAR2(20) NOT NULL, COUNTRYCODE VARCHAR2(2) NOT NULL, ENABLED TINYINT(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(id) );
